DataSourcePortable.Name: AUTOGERADA_CONTAS_TOTALIZADO
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT COUNT(*) QUANTIDADE
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS
WHERE USUARIOEXECUTIVO IS NOT NULL
AND USUARIORESPONSAVEL IS NULL 
AND FILIAL IN (3,11,15,16,17)
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="QUANTIDADE" From="A" Path="QUANTIDADE" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
